alert.note: Alert for Cuyama Valley; San Luis Obispo County Central Coast; San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys; Santa Barbara County Central Coast; Santa Barbara County South Coast; Santa Ynez Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 28 at 4:52AM PDT until March 28 at 3:00PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...South to southeast winds 20 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. Isolated gusts to 55 mph in the foothills. * WHERE...Santa Barbara County Central Coast, San Luis Obispo County Central Coast, San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys, Santa Ynez Valley, Santa Barbara County South Coast and Cuyama Valley. * WHEN...Until 3 PM PDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Cuyama Valley; San Luis Obispo County Central Coast; San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys; Santa Barbara County Central Coast; Santa Barbara County South Coast; Santa Ynez Valley
